ValidationRule.description: Resolution Status is required when a risk is closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(TEXT( PgM_Resolution_Status__c )) && RecordType.Name = 'Risk' && (ISPICKVAL( PgM_Status__c , "Closed") || ISPICKVAL( PgM_Status__c, 'Closed - Pending Review'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Resolution Status is required when a Risk is Closed.
